text: Henry Clay, Jr. (April 10, 1811 â€“ February 23, 1847) was an American politician and soldier. He was the son of Henry Clay. After his studies of law, he enrolled in the military. He fought in the Mexican-American War, and was killed in the Battle of Buena Vista. ==Other websites== *Henry Clay, Jr. at Find a Grave Category:1811 births Category:1847 deaths Category:Military people from Kentucky
title: Henry Clay Jr.
